SEARCH
Package Network.ServerSide

Class RemoteServerImplementation

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
Network.ServerSide.RemoteServerImplementation
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Remote, RemoteServerInterface
public class RemoteServerImplementation extends UnicastRemoteObject implements RemoteServerInterface
This Class contains the implementation of all the Remote Methods provided by RemoteServerInterface and also other methods used by the RemoteServer to access and give orders to the GameController
See Also:

      Parameters:
      gameController - the GameController to bind
      Throws:
      RemoteException - exception that underlines problems with the RMI Connection

    • onTilePickMessage

      public TileReplyMessage onTilePickMessage(String nickname, int x, int y)
      Description copied from interface: RemoteServerInterface
      This method allows a RemoteClient to ask the RemoteServer to pick a PlayableItemTile from the LivingRoom
      Specified by:
      onTilePickMessage in interface RemoteServerInterface
      Parameters:
      nickname - a String containing the nickname of the Player that is asking to pick a PlayableItemTile
      x - the 'x' position in the LivingRoom of the PlayableItemTile to pick in the LivingRoom
      y - the 'y' position in the LivingRoom of the PlayableItemTile to pick

    • ToPutTileRequestMessage

      public InsertionReplyMessage ToPutTileRequestMessage(int xPos, int yPos, PlayableItemTile tile, int numOfTiles)
      Description copied from interface: RemoteServerInterface
      This method allows a RemoteClient to ask the RemoteServer to put the first picked PlayableItemTile into the Shelf
      Specified by:
      ToPutTileRequestMessage in interface RemoteServerInterface
      Parameters:
      xPos - the 'x' position in the Shelf of the PlayableItemTile will be put
      yPos - the 'y' position in the Shelf where the PlayableItemTile will be put
      tile - the PlayableItemTile to put into the Shelf
      numOfTiles - the total number of PlayableItemTiles to put into the Shelf
